name: Mythos (itch) (DavidBogu)
description:
Controls

Synopsis:
With Mythos, Quiver Games brings a new take on the metroidvania genre, creating an innovative interactive magic system and pitting the player against an interdimensional evil unseen for millennia. In Mythos, you play as Oskar, a young teenager with a magic tome, and explore remnants of interlocking dimensions comprised of unique environments, hazards and secrets on a quest to find their parents. Become more powerful as you collect different abilities that will customize the way you attack, traverse the worlds and test your skill against challenging bosses.
